description:
Dorion is an alternative Discord client aimed towards lower-spec or storage-sensitive PCs that supports themes, plugins, and more!


Changes
- Dorion UI components are now translatable!
- Notifications now navigate you to the message/channel it came from (Windows and Linux only)
- Antitrack is now installed by default
- Dorion now keeps track of system idle properly, in order to set "Away" status
  - Before, it would go off of the time since window was last interacted with
  - Library can be found on crates.io: https://crates.io/crates/system-idle-time
- Add --profile <name> argument
  - You can now, for example, create multiple Dorion shortcuts for different profiles and have them run independently
- Taskbar icon now does that flashing thing when you receive a notification (#393)
- Fix "Dorion Plugins" setting (#390)
- Other minor fixes, probably
